entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • QuickGrid: QuickGridItemsProvider naming suggestion #42738
  • Enable BindNever or BindingBehavior(BindingBehavior.Never) for Blazor WebAssembly Shared Project(Model) #42736
  • [Question] Implementation of IOQueue's Execute #42735
  • Reset the Counter on a Specific RateLimiter #42729
  • Web API call succeeds but returns 0 bytes for large response objects #42726
  • Add IStreamClosedFeature #42725

Closed

  • Support automatically registering OpenAPI security schemes in authenticated apps #42261
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Improve JSON validation schema generation in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` #41246
    7.0-preview6
  • core identity tokens should already be safe for urls #42730
  • Documentation for Microsoft.AspNetCore.SpaProxy #42732
  • Add support for EventCallback using JSInterop #42686
  • Cannot run IntegrationTests on WebSockets, and cannot self-host server in a test #42657
  • Blazor CustomElement Development and Blazor WASM Host #42727
  • Allow consistent `Problem Details` generation #42212
    7.0-preview7
  • Xamarin Android & Websockets #41835
  • Moving or renaming files in pre-build event causes errors while publishing project in net6.0 #42579
  • RequireHost and reverse proxy #42252
  • If there is no operation for a long time, the wpf which use blazor hybrid will crash. #42569

PullRequests

Created

  • Change to summary for IEndpointConventionBuilder.WithName method #42737
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Rename EmptyServiceProvicer => EmptyServiceProvider #42723
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • HTTP/3: Avoid ConnectionAbortedException allocations #42708
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • [draft] JavaScript interop via [JSImport] and [JSExport] #41665
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience #42548
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0-preview7
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview7
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • refactor : use new `ThrowIf` overload of `ObjectDisposedException` #42613
    area-blazor, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Support loading OIDC options from configuration #42679
    area-security, area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce per-HealthCheck periodicity #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • Uniquify `$(TestPackageRestorePath)` values #42722
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, feature-templates
  • [SignalR] [.NET Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #42671
    area-signalr
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • HTTP/3: Avoid per-request cancellation token allocations #42685
    area-runtime
  • Add Web Application Builder analyzers/fixers and tests #42724
    area-web-frameworks
